Line 85: Line 85:
According to the Forbes 400 list, the combined networth of Larry Page and Sergey Brin is $8 billion US.
According to the Forbes 400 list, the combined networth of Larry Page and Sergey Brin is $8 billion US.
But due to the recent surge in stock price (April 2005-June 2005), their networth is significantly higher, nearly triple. When recorded on the Forbes 400 the stock was around a level of $111. Its most recent close was $303. That is an approximate wealth of $10.91 Billion in stock. This is not 100% accurate as both Page and Brin sold an enormous amount of stock before the 50% surge from the $200 mark. The combined sale of their stock on the open market was reportedly $2 Billion total.

  +   +
*Larry Page and Sergey Brin no longer recieve $45k a year, in attempt mimic Steve P. Jobs, they both decided to recieve a pay of $1.00 a year, cash.
